title: Airborne Transmission
description: A short lesson to help you apply Airborne Transmission.

hook.text: One person with measles in a room can infect everyone who enters for two hours after they've left.

buildup.text: Airborne pathogens travel in tiny droplet nuclei that float in the air and are inhaled into the lungs.

punchline.text: The route of spread determines the route of defense.
